Choose 1 of 3 random #yResonant cards and add !P! copies to your hand, they cost 0 this turn.

${ModID}:WhirlpoolPotion.NAME: Whirlpool Potion

DESCRIPTIONS: Gain #yTemporary #yHP equal to !P!% of your max HP.
${ModID}:ElixirOfFalseHealth.FLAVOR: I manage to successfully brew this about 1 out of 3 times.

Gain !P! Max HP and obtain 2 unique #yCurses.
